Package org.apache.tiles.request.freemarker.servlet

Class WebappClassTemplateLoader

java.lang.Object
org.apache.tiles.request.freemarker.servlet.WebappClassTemplateLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader
public class WebappClassTemplateLoader extends Object implements freemarker.cache.TemplateLoader
Delegates loading templates using a WebappTemplateLoader and, if not found, a ClassTemplateLoader. The resources are loaded from the webapp root and from the classpath root.
